Queries.sqlQueryCajaEAGLE: SELECT res.resultkey ,obj.barcode AS BARCODE ,res.value AS CL, obj.bankidx AS RECHAZO ,DATE(MAX(obj.TIME)) AS FECHA FROM result res JOIN OBJECT obj ON res.objectkey = obj objectkey JOIN product prod ON prod.productkey = obj.productkey JOIN lane la ON la.lanekey = prod.lanekey JOIN (SELECT ob.barcode ,Max(ob.TIME) AS TIME FROM OBJECT ob WHERE ob TIME BETWEEN (now() - interval '3 min') AND NOW() GROUP BY ob.barcode ) AS maxObj ON maxObj.barcode = obj.barcode AND maxObj.TIME = obj.TIME WHERE la.machinekey IN (1,3) AND obj.TIME BETWEEN (now() - interval '3 min') AND NOW() GROUP BY res.resultkey ,obj.barcode ,res.value ,obj.bankidx ORDER BY fecha DESC
Queries.sqlQueryGetAllEAGLE: select mach.name as MachineName, pro.productkey, pro.name as ProductName, analisis.objectkey, analisis.barcode, analisis.bankidx, to_char(analisis.time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS Time, res.value, res.auxvalue from object analisis inner join result res ON res.objectkey = analisis.objectkey inner  join product pro ON pro.productkey = analisis.productkey inner  join lane la ON la.lanekey = pro.lanekey inner  join machine mach ON mach.machinekey = la.machinekey where  analisis.time > '@fecha' order by analisis.time asc
Queries.sqlQueryGetAllByDayEAGLE: select mach.name as MachineName, pro.productkey, pro.name as ProductName, analisis.objectkey, analisis.barcode, analisis.bankidx, to_char(analisis.time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS Time, res.value, res.auxvalue from object analisis inner join result res ON res.objectkey = analisis.objectkey inner  join product pro ON pro.productkey = analisis.productkey inner  join lane la ON la.lanekey = pro.lanekey inner  join machine mach ON mach.machinekey = la.machinekey where  analisis.time > '@fecha' and analisis.time < '@siguienteDia' order by analisis.time asc
